Sentencas: A new combustion spray process has been developed for depositing films and coatings from particles (or particulate materials) suspended in a flammable liquid.
Titulo: Porous electrodes for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by a combustion spray process

Sentencas: The suspension is pumped to an atomizer to produce a mist of the droplets, which is then ignited to create a combustion flame.
Titulo: Porous electrodes for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by a combustion spray process

Sentencas: The solid particles are thermally activated for formation of films and coatings on a substrate inserted into or near the flame.
Titulo: Porous electrodes for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by a combustion spray process

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with porous electrodes fabricated by combustion spray show better performance than those prepared by other fabrication processes (such as conventional dry-pressing and firing) especially at low operating temperatures.
Titulo: Porous electrodes for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells fabricated by a combustion spray process
